name: PowPow
description:
Blast each other from space in a local multiplayer game with 2 to 30 people.

This is mostly a demo for happyfuntimes which is a free open source library you can use with HTML5 or Unity to make local multiplayer games where users use their phones as controllers. Of course phones don't make great d-pads but be a little more creative and you can make all kinds of new and interesting games.
